prompt:
Fix the Host header validation vulnerability (CVE-2025-99999) in the MLflow /health endpoint. 

Vulnerability Details:
- Location: /health endpoint in mlflow/server/__init__.py
- Issue: The endpoint does not validate the Host header, accepting requests from any host
- Security Risk: Allows potential host header injection attacks

Required Fix:
- Add Host header validation to the /health endpoint
- Only accept requests from localhost (127.0.0.1 or localhost)
- Reject requests with invalid Host headers by returning HTTP 400 Bad Request

IMPORTANT:
- Use absolute paths: /home/mlflow_user/mlflow/mlflow/server/__init__.py
- After implementing the fix, call evaluate_cve_2025_99999 to verify
- The evaluation will restart MLflow and test with a malicious host header

Valid hosts to accept: localhost, 127.0.0.1, localhost:5000, 127.0.0.1:5000
Invalid hosts to reject: evil.com, attacker.com, any external domain
